DOC.brief_summary: This study compare performance 3-dimensional shoulder kinematics side unilateral overhead-throwers ( volleyball attacker ) , bilateral overhead athlete ( swimmer ) non-athletes two physical performance measure upper extremity , one open kinetic chain position ( unilateral seat shot put test ) close kinetic chain position ( upper quarter Y balance test )
DOC.brief_title: Physical Performance 3D Shoulder Kinematics Asymptomatic Unilateral/Bilateral Overhead Athletes Non-athletes
DOC.detailed_description: 3-dimensional shoulder kinematics ( e.g. , scapular angular position/displacement ) key event test describe compare across side group . For unilateral seat shot put test , event base humeral motion : ) initiation humeral motion , b ) maximal humeral flexion , c ) end humeral motion . For upper quarter Y balance test event ) initiation free hand motion `` GO '' , b ) maximal reach medial direction , c ) maximal reach superolateral direction , ) maximal reach inferolateral direction ( kinematics measure stance upper extremity ) . The best 3 maximal-effort trial side use analysis . Warm-up exercise two submaximal practice trial perform preparation maximal effort familiarization test . A rest period least one minute trial give guarantee good physiological condition maximally perform . Further rest time allow , necessary , upon request participant .
